title: Gen Y
description:
For teenage girl Chas, life will never be the same again... After the undead crash her fourteenth birthday party, Chasity and her best friends spend the night running from ravenous zombies, crazed gorillas, and trigger-happy soldiers. Upon reuniting with their family, they find refuge at a nearby military base. Sometimes, you just have to break the rules... At the mercy of power hungry officials, the situation quickly becomes unbearable, and Chas realizes that true salvation lies outside the boundaries of military order. She's forced to make a choice between being a good girl or doing what it takes to survive. These grown-ups don't know who they're messing with... 
For fans of all things zombie comes a post-apocalyptic tale like no other, filled with suspense, action, and humor. Book 2 in the Series.

Scroll up and grab your copy now!
author: Baileigh Higgins
